description: BEST Toronto Tours & Limousines is a Travel/Tours/Transportation company based in Toronto-Ontario, Canada. We offer world class tours with state of art transportation suite at competitive price range. We operate daily tour to Niagara Falls from Toronto with variety of packages. Niagara Falls Day Tours from Toronto is one of the most famous that tourist have been taking for years. We operate seven days around the clock, from our main office near Toronto Pearson Airport. Private Tours can be organized as part of a group or individual according to requirement. Charter Tour service available at anytime & could be customized to meet your needs.

reviews.title: Really recommend going on this tour
text: We had Hassan as our driver on the Niagara day trip tour. He was knowledgeable and helpful with myself and my mother, as well as the other guests. Individuals pick ups from hotels in the airport area, so didn‚Äôt have to find our own way to a random location for pickup and drop off. Hassan provided great recommendations for activities at Niagara Falls, and then took us sight seeing up along the river to Niagara on the Lake.

It was a comfortable and safe van, the ride was pleasant and views were immaculate. I am so glad we were recommended to contact Hassan‚Äôs tour by the hotel we were staying at and would recommend to friends and family if they were staying in Toronto.

reviews.title: Good to be back at our hotel
text: Such a difficult day.So much driving in a malfunctioning air conditioned van.Be aware that this tour doesn't include the Niagara falls boat cruise. You must find the ticket office, stand in line, and board the boat while given free time by the tour guide.
We didn't hear any of the guide's commentary; as we were seated at the back listening to the fan.
None of this is the guide's fault. He did try to cope. He needs a microphone or a small speaker. The air conditioner needs to be serviced.The traffic was shocking.

reviews.title: 1st class experience to Niagara Falls.
text: Our tour guide/driver Hassan was incredible. Very friendly and knowledgeable. showed us interesting sites along the way and also areas to avoid and areas to go to that won't rip you off. Loved that we were in a private sprinter bus, not that crowded, and were picked up and dropped off at the hotel. Would use this company again and take other tours.

reviews.title: The best private tour we ever had to Niagara Falls
text: "We had an excellent tour to Niagara falls. The tour guide Waseem was wonderful. We felt like a group of friends enjoying the Niagara Falls and Niagara-on-the-lakes with lots of positive energy. We were well taken care of - the company, the blend of travel and time to just enjoy were all perfect."

reviews.title: Unbelievably great!
text: A simple ride from Toronto to Niagara Falls turned into a wondrous sightseeing tour, thanks to our amazing driver, Hassan. We got there in good time, and saw all kinds of great local sights. He dropped us off at the most amazing lunch place, picked us up promptly, took us on a wine tour... I would recommend Hassan and Best Toronto Tours to anyone who wants a thoroughly satisfying experience. 12 Stars.

reviews.title: Wonderful day
text: We booked a private tour for our family of five. We were in a very comfortable mini bus. Our driver Hussain was very knowledgeable of the area. He pointed out numerous things that wasn't a scheduled part of the tour. It was a perfect experience for us. I would recommend this tour for anyone wanting a great trip to Niagara Falls.

reviews.title: Outstanding experience on the Mercedes sprinter to Niagara Falls!
text: We had a phenomenal time on tour in Niagara Falls with the Best Toronto Tour & Limo service. We got picked up in a nice white Mercedes sprinter from Toronto Downtown and had a great time on our way to the fall, thanks to the humorous driver. We got to visit the winery, Niagra on the lake, and many more beautiful places before we were dropped off at the falls for around 3 hours and then later picked up to be taken to a nice place to have lunch. I recommend this tour for anyone whom is seeking to have a great time while viewing one of the worlds greatest wonders!

reviews.title: Best Tours Toronto
text: Our driver was mr sam and he had great knowledge about everything in Toronto. He gave us options on what to do. He explained very clearly the cheapest or the expensive options. he was very patient as he drove us through the traffic in down town. He was very friendly and funny. We really recommend him and his company.

reviews.title: DO NOT BOOK WITH THESE GUYS!!
text: My experience mirrors that of the 2 stars and under reviews. We went on the Niagara Falls tour was was gravely disappointed in the trip as a whole. Lots of stops at tourist traps and very little time at the actual tour destination. Do yourselves a favor before you book this and look into bus trips to the Falls for significantly less or any other tour for that matter. No discount for seniors and children which is offered through other tours and your 'VIP discount' on amenities at the Falls is literally $0.30 off the ticket price.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls Tour
text: Suresh was the bomb.com! Basically it was a good tour with a kind and good tour guide. He picked us up to and from our hotel. Informed us of good information about the city, history, and people. Learned some new things! Thanks!

reviews.title: We felt home. Thank you Mr Suresh!
text: Our driver was Mr SURESH and the best word to describe him is 'Wonderful'. He brought us to Niagara and explained to the very single bit with passion, without any complain.

We felt his passion, warmth and faith towards his clients. He is smooth with his driving despite the bomb of questions being thrown by us all the way. A great impression of a hardworking Canadian is shown by him!

reviews.title: Niagara falls
text: The driver, Suresh, took us to the falls and we visited plenty of other great places during the day too. A great, full, day and well worth the price. Suresh was friendly, kind, accommodating and patient. He went out of the way to make sure I did what I'd wanted to do & was really helpful. Great company too. I'd recommend him to anyone.
Dan (U.K)

reviews.title: Same great service, always finding new places to see.
text: Spent a very enjoyable day with Hassan, (Sam). He picked us up on time and got us to the airport a little early. Better than late for sure. He was very friendly and helpful. Stopped a couple extra places because we were making good time.

reviews.title: Private tour to Niagara Falls and Area...Vey accomodating and Affordable
text: Niagara falls Tour and Niagara on the Lake. Hassan was our driver and tour guide for the day. He took my son and I to Niagara Falls, to beautiful look out points most tourists wouldn't see, and wine tasting.  He provided historic information on the region and was most accommodating when we had to stop at a mall to do a quick errand. On our way back the visibility was compromised because of heavy rain. Hassan is a very skilled and defensive driver and I knew we were in good care. Hassan provides excellent, affordable and on time service.  I highly recommend this company for all your tour needs in the Niagara Falls area. He picked us up at the airport and the only thing we had to do was sit back relax, and enjoy the scenery for the day.

reviews.title: Private tour to Niagara Falls
text: Had 2 visitors here from the UK. Wanted a private tour of Niagara Falls and Niagara on the Lake. Waseem our driver was on time and extremely accommodating. He took us where we wanted to go and customized our trip for us. He was very knowledgeable and funny. We had a lovely day and he made the trip worthwhile.

reviews.title: On time and very accomodating
text: I booked this tour on line and paid through pay-pal.  I received a very courteous response and, since this was a private tour, was asked what time we wanted to be picked up.  We chose 10:00 AM and would then have the driver until 6:00. Hussein arrived at 10 AM on the dot. He was courteous, informative and very flexible. We like to explore on our own, so Hussein gave us his mobile number and was always minutes away when we were ready to go tour next site.  I would use this service again--it was also the least expensive of private tours.

reviews.title: Best honeymoon trip to Niagara Falls
text: We booked a tour from the Grand Toronto Hotel to Niagara Falls. The next morning we were picked up by a limousine on our honeymoon (which was nice!) and taken to meet the bus for the next part of our journey. We thoroughly enjoyed the tour and Hassan made the tour so much better. We had a few hours at Niagara Falls and he organised getting the tickets for us, we then went to Niagara on the lake where he bought us a yummy doughnut. The journey was made so easy by these guys and I would definitely recommend booking with them.

reviews.title: Worst private tour ive had-- the niagara private tour
text: The private tour is a waste of money. If i wanted a lousy driver to drive me around i wouldve booked a taxi or something. Dont book this tour. They say they include everything but they only drop u off at places.

reviews.title: Never showed up
text: Toronto Limo was to pick me up at 5PM in Toronto to take me to my 50th high school reunion in Oakville. The driver called to say he was a few minutes late. I called him several times. He called at 5:45 to say he was there. He was not. He was at the Drop Off location in Oakville.
The manager barely apologized and said there was nothing he could do. I drove, arrived 1.5 hours late and could not have the desired drinks with friends I had not seen in 50 years.
I had to call the next day to get the charges reversed. No apology.

reviews.title: Great Service Once Again!
text: I've previously used Best Toronto Tours service and had a great time. However this time my friends were visiting I had planned a private city tour along with the Niagara tour. Our driver was well informed and the company was very understanding about the customization. Certainly would recommend!!

reviews.title: Great service
text: the hotel reception booked this company for us for our trip to Niagara , we had a full days touring, the falls, Niagara on the lake , Niagara village, the whirlpool where the Niagara River changes course, and to a winery , a very full day and well worth doing

reviews.title: Brilliant trip
text: Zaidi picked us up from hotel in Scarborough and took us to pick-up point in Toronto. The trip was comfortable, clean and the driver, Suresh, was both friendly & informative.There was plenty of time to look around & have lunch after the most exhilarating ride on Hornblower.Stops on the way back included Niagara-on-the-Lake, the floral clock & a winery for tastings. Zaidi once more picked us up downtown and returned us to our hotel. A lovely day out.Special thanks to Suresh for his kindness in helping my wife (who has a hip problem) on & off the bus.

reviews.title: Great Family Adventure
text: We had an absolutely unforgettable trip to Niagara Falls and a city tour around Toronto. Both drivers were well informed and showed us around. Certainly recommend this company. Great service.

reviews.title: Absolutely Great Tour
text: The tour was with Syed on the Best Toronto Tour which was a pleasant experience. He was very welcoming. The Niagara Falls trip included a tour to Niagara town  which is a beautiful flower town.
Then a visit to Lakeview Winery for wine tasting. Lovely.
Syed was a great tour guide

reviews.title: The Falls with Hassan!
text: The booking process was exceptionally simple and we were confirmed immediately. The day of the tour, Hassan arrived a bit earlier than the scheduled 9:30 pickup; but that was no problem, the front desk contacted us...we came down and there he was smiling and waiting for us. We hopped in the extremely comfortable van and he entertained us with polite humor and good natured jokes for the entire ride. He provided us with water, music if we wanted and made sure the temperature in the van was comfy. We arrived at the Niagara Falls and he gave us a brief drive around with instructions before leaving us for the allocated time at the drop-off and pick-up location. We thoroughly enjoyed our time there and arrived promptly at the pick-up location and there was Hassan smiling. Each time he was exceptionally courteous, helpful and entertaining. He gave us valuable information on each location and the distance between sights. Overall the sights were amazing but the tour was made enjoyable and a day to remember because of Hassan.
